t: Use Shop with Points - Amazon Customer Service
s: Amazon's Shop with Points program offers you the ability to use rewards points from participating credit card and loyalty programs for purchases at Amazon.com. You can use your reward points towards millions of items at Amazon.com checkout, including Kindle eBooks, Prime Video Purchases & Rentals, ...

t: Shop with Points Servicing Page
s: Points can be redeemed to select from a massive selection of books, newspapers, and comics. Learn more ... Stream movies, shows, award-winning Amazon Originals, premium channels, sports & more by redeeming your points at checkout.

t: Amazon Points - Amazon Customer Service
s: Amazon Points can be used to pay for purchases made on the Amazon.co.jp website. Each Amazon Point is worth ¥1 when used to buy any item.

t: Amazon.com: Shop with Points - Amazon Store Card Rewards

t: Amazon.com: Shop with Points - Capital One Rewards
s: First, ensure your eligible Capital One credit card is enrolled for Shop with Points by clicking on “Accounts & Lists” in the top right. Go to “Your Account” and then “Shop with Points” under “Shopping programs and rentals”. If enrolled, you will see your balance here.

t: Amazon.com: Shop with Points - Amazon Rewards Visa Signature Card Points

t: Shop with Points Amazon Store Card - Amazon Pay
s: The Shop with Points program is now available in even more places with Amazon Pay. You can now use the rewards from your Amazon Store Card with Amazon Pay.

t: Business Prime Rewards - Amazon Customer Service
s: Business Prime Rewards enables customers to earn points when they purchase qualifying items on Amazon Business. The program is available for Business Prime Duo or Business Prime Essentials members.
